alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 8:30PM PST until February 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches from 3000 to 5000 feet and 3 to 8 inches above 5000 feet. Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 50 mph. An inch of snow possible on the Cajon Pass. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 AM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
